description: Do Not Modify. Generated by Event Schema Generator v1.0.15 on 2020-Jun-15 08:03:33

SessionId.description: Units: Count. A lifetime counter incremented on the start of a drive session. This ID uniquely defines a drive session for this telemetry device. The ID may be referenced by other events.

ImpactMag.title: Impact Magnitude
ImpactMag.description: Units: 0.001 g/bit. The magnitude of the last impact occurring on the asset / truck detected by the telemetry device.

ImpactAngle.title: Impact Angle
ImpactAngle.description: Units: degrees. The angle of the last impact occurring on the asset / truck detected by the telemetry device in the horizontal plane.

ImpactLevel.title: Impact Level
ImpactLevel.description: The level or category of the last impact occurring on the asset / truck detected by the telemetry device.

oneOf.title: None
oneOf.description: No level of impact has been defined, impact level is unknown.

oneOf.title: BasicActivity
oneOf.description: The level of impact is Basic Activity, meaning the activity event captured is most likely asset / truck operational noise.

oneOf.title: FullLogging
oneOf.description: The level of impact is Full Logging, meaning the impact event captured was an impact and will be displayed in customer reports.

oneOf.title: Shutdown
oneOf.description: The level of impact is Shutdown, meaning the impact event triggered the asset / truck to be shut down.

ImpactDir.title: Impact Direction
ImpactDir.description: The direction specifier of the last impact occurring on the asset / truck detected by the telemetry device.

oneOf.title: None
oneOf.description: No direction specifier has been defined, impact direction is unknown.

oneOf.title: HorizontalLeft
oneOf.description: The direction of impact is specified as horizontal left.

oneOf.title: HorizontalRight
oneOf.description: The direction of impact is specified as horizontal right.

oneOf.title: HorizontalFront
oneOf.description: The direction of impact is specified as horizontal front.

oneOf.title: HorizontalBack
oneOf.description: The direction of impact is specified as horizontal back.

oneOf.title: VerticalTop
oneOf.description: The direction of impact is specified as vertical top.

oneOf.title: VerticalBottom
oneOf.description: The direction of impact is specified as vertical bottom.

ImpactId.description: Units: Count. A lifetime counter incremented for every impact detected by the telemetry device. This ID uniquely defines an impact for this telemetry device. The ID may be referenced by other events.

AssetLockoutOccurred.description: Units: Boolean. Indicates whether or not event triggered Asset / Truck lockout. Value of true indicates event did trigger Asset / Truck lockout, thereby preventing next Asset / Truck start until review from supervisor / service technician.

ImpactBasicHThres.title: Impact Basic Activity Horizontal Threshold
ImpactBasicHThres.description: Units: 0.001 g/bit. Specifies the threshold value for the noise floor reporting feature of the impact sensor in the horizontal direction. When the telemetry device detects acceleration activity with magnitude above this threshold in the horizontal plane the details of this noise floor activity event is logged and reported to the Telemetry server.

ImpactBasicVThres.title: Impact Basic Activity Vertical Threshold
ImpactBasicVThres.description: Units: 0.001 g/bit. Specifies the threshold value for the noise floor reporting feature of the impact sensor in the vertical direction. When the telemetry device detects acceleration activity with magnitude above this threshold in the vertical plane the details of this noise floor activity event is logged and reported to the Telemetry server.

ImpactHThres.title: Impact Full Logging Horizontal Threshold
ImpactHThres.description: Units: 0.001 g/bit. Specifies the threshold value for the impact sensor in the horizontal direction, when the telemetry device detects an impact with magnitude above this threshold in the horizontal plane the details of the impact is logged and reported to the Telemetry server.

ImpactVThres.title: Impact Full Logging Vertical Threshold
ImpactVThres.description: Units: 0.001 g/bit. Specifies the threshold value for the impact sensor in the vertical direction, when the telemetry device detects an impact with magnitude above this threshold in the vertical plane the details of the impact is logged and reported to the Telemetry server.

ImpactShdwnHThres.title: Impact Shutdown Horizontal Threshold
ImpactShdwnHThres.description: Units: 0.001 g/bit. Specifies the shutdown threshold value for the impact sensor in the Horizontal direction. When the telemetry device detects an impact with magnitude exceeding the logging threshold, if the magnitude is above the shutdown threshold in the horizontal plane, the telemetry device will shut the asset / truck down. Shutdown only occurs when this feature is enabled via the Enable Impact Shutdown Option.

ImpactShdwnVThres.title: Impact Shutdown Vertical Threshold
ImpactShdwnVThres.description: Units: 0.001 g/bit. Specifies the shutdown threshold value for the impact sensor in the Vertical direction. When the telemetry device detects an impact with magnitude exceeding the logging threshold, if the magnitude is above the shutdown threshold in the vertical plane, the telemetry device will shut the asset / truck down. Shutdown only occurs when this feature is enabled via the Enable Impact Shutdown Option.

ImpactShdwnDelay.title: Impact Shutdown Delay
ImpactShdwnDelay.description: Units: Seconds. Specifies the time delay after impact before the system shuts the asset / truck down. Shutdown only occurs when this feature is enabled via the Enable Impact Shutdown Option.

OperatorId.description: ID of operator currently logged onto the asset / telemetry device.

FacilityCode.description: ID embedded in operator access card, normally referred to as site or facility code. Helps to determine which operator is currently logged onto the asset / telemetry device.

GpsPositionId.description: Units: Count. A lifetime counter incremented for every GPS position recorded/logged. This ID uniquely defines a GPS position for this telemetry device. The ID may be referenced by other events. The current value references the last logged GPS Position Event.

GpsLat.title: GPS Latitude
GpsLat.description: Units: 10^-7 deg/bit. Indicates Latitude of the last / current GPS position. Sign indicates cardinal. Negative latitude indicates South. Positive indicates North.

GpsLong.title: GPS Longitude
GpsLong.description: Units: 10^-7 deg/bit. Indicates Longitude of the last / current GPS position. Sign indicates cardinal. Negative Longitude indicates West. Positive indicates East.

ImpactLPF.title: Impact Low Pass Filter
ImpactLPF.description: Units: Low Pass Filter Frequency. Specifies the value of the Low Pass Filter to be applied to the impact detection algorithm.

Laden.description: Units: Boolean. Current status of whether asset is laden (carrying a load).

LoadWeight.description: Units: Kg. Current Weight of asset's load.

PeakSpeed.description: Units: 0.1 kph/bit. Peak Speed over the duration of this summary event.

PedalPosition.description: Units: percent. Current pedal position fuel rate of asset.
